snippet: Lief Ove Andsnes, music director of this year’s Ojai Music Festival in California, has spotlighted Scandinavian composers and performers.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews performances at the Ojai Music Festival in Ojai, Calif, featuring works by a number of Scandinavian classical music composers and performers.
lead_paragraph: Lief Ove Andsnes, music director of this year’s Ojai Music Festival in California, has spotlighted Scandinavian composers and performers.

headline.seo: Under Leif Ove Andsnes, Ojai Festival Enjoys Long Scandinavian Nights
headline.main: Ojai Savors a Scandinavian Import: Long Musical Nights
headline.print_headline: Ojai Savors a Scandinavian Import: Long Musical Nights
